timeline.message:
[MOB-2411] - Offline flag in config

Revised PR:
1.  Added offlineProcessing boolean flag in `IterableConfig` defaulted to false with package private method `setOfflineProcessing`
2.  Added setOfflineProcessingEnabled method in apiClient for IterableApi to be able to set offline/online mode after/during initializaiton.
3.  Based on flag true or false, online or offline requestProcessor is initialized. Any requestprocessor invocation before that will pass through onlineRequestProcessor

update: Reverted to `non-static` for apiclient and authHandler
